name: Blue Sea Marine Corp.
description: Blue Sea Marine Corp. is a leading innovator in the maritime technology and services industry, dedicated to providing advanced solutions for marine vessels and operations. Founded in 2010, Blue Sea Marine focuses on enhancing the efficiency, safety, and sustainability of marine transportation. The company specializes in developing cutting-edge navigation systems, engine management technologies, and environmental solutions aimed at reducing emissions and improving fuel efficiency. With a commitment to research and development, Blue Sea Marine collaborates with various marine organizations and regulatory bodies to set new standards in the industry. Their flagship products include state-of-the-art GPS systems, automated engine controls, and comprehensive maritime software solutions, which are designed to meet the diverse needs of shipping companies, fishing fleets, and recreational boaters alike. As global demand for sustainable maritime practices increases, Blue Sea Marine positions itself as a pivotal player in the transition towards greener shipping, striving to minimize the environmental impact of sea transport while maximizing operational effectiveness. The company is headquartered in Seattle, Washington, and boasts a team of experienced professionals with extensive backgrounds in marine engineering and technology.

seo.meta_title: Blue Sea Marine Corp. | Innovating Maritime Technology and Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Blue Sea Marine Corp., a leader in maritime technology. Discover how our innovative products enhance the efficiency and sustainability of marine operations.

faq.question: What does Blue Sea Marine Corp. specialize in?
faq.answer: Blue Sea Marine Corp. specializes in developing advanced navigation systems, engine management technologies, and environmental solutions for marine vessels.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Blue Sea Marine Corp.?
faq.answer: Jessica Harmon is the CEO of Blue Sea Marine Corp.

faq.question: Where is Blue Sea Marine headquartered?
faq.answer: Blue Sea Marine is headquartered in Seattle, Washington, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products offered by Blue Sea Marine?
faq.answer: The main products include GPS navigation systems, automated engine controls, and maritime operations software.

faq.question: When was Blue Sea Marine Corp. founded?
faq.answer: Blue Sea Marine Corp. was founded in 2010.
